description: I love pi-hole but the snap does not work on Ubuntu 20.04 yet.

sudo snap installe pihol-snap --edge  ///wrong

sudo snap installe --edge pihol-snap  ///right  bcs still prerelease channel
Einfach gut und sehr mächtiges Werkzeug um den kapitalistischen System ein Schnippchen zu schlagen!

hunt@hunt-SVF14221CLW:~$ sudo pihole-snap -up
/snap/pihole-snap/18/opt/pihole/pihole: line 21: /opt/pihole/COL_TABLE: No such file or directory
/snap/pihole-snap/18/opt/pihole/pihole: line 65: /opt/pihole/update.sh: No such file or directory
hunt@hunt-SVF14221CLW:~$ sudo pihole-snap uninstall
/snap/pihole-snap/18/opt/pihole/pihole: line 21: /opt/pihole/COL_TABLE: No such file or directory
/snap/pihole-snap/18/opt/pihole/pihole: line 93: /opt/pihole/uninstall.sh: No such file or directory
hunt@hunt-SVF14221CLW:~$ sudo pihole-snap -r
/snap/pihole-snap/18/opt/pihole/pihole: line 21: /opt/pihole/COL_TABLE: No such file or directory
